name: Glo Dollar
additional_notices: The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.

description.en:
Glo is the anti-poverty version of the dollar.

Lift people out of poverty by adopting the Glo Dollar. Glo will be 1:1 backed by the Glo Reserve.
Glo is a nonprofit. When Glo is live, we'll make money by investing the Glo Reserve in bonds—but we'll donate 100% to GiveDirectly.
